description: Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   I just got my hands on the new Xbox Series X 2024 All Digital and Galaxy Black 2TB Special Edition models and uncovered some surprising changes under the hood. Through testing and a full teardown, I reveal the improvements Microsoft made without telling anyone. Find out how these hidden upgrades impact performance, power consumption, and potentially the future of Xbox.  Chapter Titles: 0:00 Unboxing Series X All Digital 1:43 Unboxing Series X 2TB Special Edition 2:48 Weight 4:13 Teardown 6:36 New Heatsink 7:37 2020 vs 2024 Changes 10:22 6nm SoC 11:49 Thermals, Noise and Power
